query.value:
@concat('select
DOH.*,
DSA.SANAME,
DSAC.SANAME as SANAMEC,
DSAR.SANAME as SANAMER,
CARVEH.BVINUM,
CARVEH.BPRCDE,
VKTR3.VKOFFN,
case when URMSHP.GHBTIM is null then URMSOP.GMBTIM else URMSHP.GHBTIM  end as GHBTIM,
case when URMSHP.GHDATE is null then URMSOP.GMDATE else URMSHP.GHDATE end as GHDATE
FROM DASFPA.DOH DOH
     LEFT JOIN DASFPA.DSA DSA ON DSA.SAUSER = DOH.OHUSIN and DSA.SAUSER <> ''''
	LEFT JOIN DASFPA.DSA DSAC ON DSAC.SAUSER = DOH.OHUSCR and DSAC.SAUSER <> ''''
	LEFT JOIN DASFPA.DSA DSAR ON DSAR.SARCPT = DOH.OHRCPT and DSAR.SARCPT <> ''''
     LEFT JOIN DASFPA.CARVEH CARVEH ON CARVEH.BREGNO = DOH.OHREGN
     LEFT JOIN DASFPA.VKTR3 VKTR3 ON VKTR3.VKKONT = DOH.OHORDN
                                     AND VKTR3.VKFILN = DOH.OHBRAN
	LEFT JOIN DASFPA.URMSHP URMSHP ON URMSHP.GHSDOC = DOH.OHORDN 
							  AND URMSHP.GHBRAN = DOH.OHBRAN
LEFT JOIN DASFPA.URMSOP URMSOP ON URMSOP.GMSDOC = DOH.OHORDN 
							  AND URMSOP.GMBRAN = DOH.OHBRAN
							  where DOH.OHBRAN = ', pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'  and ((ohstat IN(0, 1, 2, 3, 4) and ohtype = ''W'' and OHINVC = '''' and cast(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(doh.OHORCC,doh.OHORYY),''-''),trim(doh.OHORMM)),''-''), doh.OHORDD ) as date) >= ''',formatDateTime(adddays(utcnow(),-365), 'yyyy-MM-dd') , ''')) or (DOH.OHORDN in (', activity('Get wipnos').output.firstRow.werkorders, '))')

@concat('
select OTORDN,OTBRAN,OTTEXT from DASFPA.dot where OTORDN in (', activity('Get wipnos').output.firstRow.werkorders, ') and OTBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf)

@concat('
SELECT * FROM DASFPA.DOW where OWORDN in (', activity('Get wipnos').output.firstRow.werkorders, ') and OWBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf)

@concat('
SELECT * FROM DASFPA.URMSHP where GHSDOC in (', activity('Get wipnos').output.firstRow.werkorders, ') and GHBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf, ' or GHDATE = ''', formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),''' and GHBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf)

@concat('
SELECT MWBRAN
      ,MWMEDW
      ,MWMEDN
      ,MWMAST
      ,MWMAEN
      ,MWMAP1S
      ,MWMAP1E
      ,MWMAP2S
      ,MWMAP2E
      ,MWMAP3S
      ,MWMAP3E
      ,MWDIST
      ,MWDIEN
      ,MWDIP1S
      ,MWDIP1E
      ,MWDIP2S
      ,MWDIP2E
      ,MWDIP3S
      ,MWDIP3E
      ,MWWOST
      ,MWWOEN
      ,MWWOP1S
      ,MWWOP1E
      ,MWWOP2S
      ,MWWOP2E
      ,MWWOP3S
      ,MWWOP3E
      ,MWDOST
      ,MWDOEN
      ,MWDOP1S
      ,MWDOP1E
      ,MWDOP2S
      ,MWDOP2E
      ,MWDOP3S
      ,MWDOP3E
      ,MWVRST
      ,MWVREN
      ,MWVRP1S
      ,MWVRP1E
      ,MWVRP2S
      ,MWVRP2E
      ,MWVRP3S
      ,MWVRP3E
      ,MWZAST
      ,MWZAEN
      ,MWZAP1S
      ,MWZAP1E
      ,MWZAP2S
      ,MWZAP2E
      ,MWZAP3S
      ,MWZAP3E
      ,MWZOST
      ,MWZOEN
      ,MWZOP1S
      ,MWZOP1E
      ,MWZOP2S
      ,MWZOP2E
      ,MWZOP3S
      ,MWZOP3E
      ,MWVRYD
      ,MWATVD
      ,MWSALV
      ,MWSALA
      ,MWMOJN
      ,MWPLJN
      ,MWSEQN
      ,MWPERC
      ,MWDOOR
      ,MWSPEC
      ,MWVNLN
      ,MWAFDL
      ,MWKPUU
      ,MWPAST
      ,MWPAEN
      ,MWP1ST
      ,MWP1EN
      ,MWP2ST
      ,MWP2EN
      ,MWZAUTYP
      ,MWZOUTYP
      ,MWUSER FROM DASFPA.URMEDW where MWBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf)

@concat('
SELECT * FROM DASFPA.URMSOP where GMSDOC in (', activity('Get wipnos').output.firstRow.werkorders, ') and GMBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf, ' or GMDATE = ''', formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),''' and GMBRAN = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf)
